form.subject: CommandLine gives segmentation fault in interp mode
form.description:
A program that uses `arguments' from `CommandLine' works when compiled, but results in a segmentation fault when run in interpreter mode.
A warning would be appropriate and it would be even better if `arguments' worked in interpreter mode as well.
form.wadescr: compile instead of interpret aldor -fx -laldor testargs.as ./testargs
